title: Yamaha FG-180 1974
description: Vintage acoustic guitar with mahogany back and visible pickguard wear. Original tuners, moderate fret wear.

title: Fender Jazz Bass 1998
description: Four-string electric bass, alder body, maple neck. Some scratches on the body, electronics fully working.

title: Roland Juno-60
description: Analog synthesizer with fully working chorus, clean keybed, minor panel wear. Includes original power cable.

title: Gibson Les Paul Standard 2012
description: Solidbody electric guitar with mahogany body and maple top, 22 frets. Moderate pick wear, original humbuckers, includes hard case.

title: Gibson SG Standard 2017
description: Mahogany body and neck, rosewood fingerboard. Light finish wear, electronics fully working, no major dents.

title: Gibson ES-335 2005
description: Semi-hollow electric guitar with maple body, block inlays, original pickups. Minor buckle rash, includes hard case.

title: Gibson J-45 2010
description: Slope-shoulder acoustic guitar, spruce top, mahogany back and sides. Stable neck angle, light scratches, upgraded saddle.

title: Gibson Hummingbird 1995
description: Square-shoulder acoustic guitar with cherry sunburst finish. Moderate play wear, original pickguard, includes case.
